reviews.review: Игра отличная , не для тупых , проходил с упаением. С увереностью могу сказать что эта одна из тех игр , в которую ты не разрешишь играть никому , пока сам её не пройдешь. Не смотря на то что игра великолепная , моя оценка ей 9/10 , мне не хватило сложных тестов , в остальном игра шикарная.

Portal 1 war ein sehr gutes Puzzlespiel. Ich dachte mir, besser kanns nicht werden. Dann kam Portal 2. Bessere Grafik, abwechlungsreiche Gebiete,  längere Spieldauer, bessere Handlung, bessere Rätsesl. Portal 2 macht das was ein Nachfolger machen muss.
ein absolut grandioses spiel mit coolen rätseln humor und einer supper stimmung ein muss have für jeden pc spieler

Probablemente sea el juego que mas influyo en mi, me lo he dado vuelta 5 veces a lo largo de los años y es que no te puedes cansar de él. lo tiene de todo, puzzles llenos de ingenio, nuevas mecanicas, un poco de comedia y como siempre una buena historia cannon al primer juego, apenas tuve la oportunidad de llevarme los dos, los compre instantaneamente, 100% recomendado sobre todo que puedes jugar coop tanto online como offline, ahora ultimo tiene como nuevo los mapas de la comunidad atravez de la steam workshop y son geniales.
legal
dadasd

Un gran juego, anteriormente lo descarge pirata y ahora que tengo cuenta de steam no dude en comprarlo.
Sinceramente se los recomiendo =)
Incrivel,esse jogo possui uma das personagens mais carismaticas que eu já vi em um jogo e ela nem é humana.
Обожаю что Portal 1 что Portal 2!Лудшие головоломки в моей жизни!
There is something so timeless about this game; I feel like I can come back thirty years from now and still have as much fun.

It's good

Do you want to escape a giant ass lab using nothing but portals? Do you want to experience a story unlike any other? Do you want to get stuck on levels for over 40 minutes, then search for a walkthrough and feel absolutely retarded for not knowing the solution? Then this is the game for you!
Portal 2 é um jogo você entra na pele de uma prisoneira que tenta fugir de um laboratorio secreto do governo usando a portal gun enfrentando varias salas e puzzles .

bu oyunun zorluğunu şöyle tanımlıyım: Hayatımda yaptığım en büyük başarı portal 2 multiplayer haritalar...

NOT: OYUN BEYİN İSTİYO BENDE KALMADI. :D

Jedna z nejlepších her, co jsem kdy hrál.

+příběh
+nápad
+stupňující se obtížnost (po chvíli na vše příjdete)
+vtipné hlášky
+co-op (i jeho lehké propojení s příběhovou částí)
+grafická nenáročnost (rozjede pomalu i toustovač)
+steam workshop

-v kapitole 6 jsem trochu déle hledal cestu
-mrzí mě kratší doba hraní (u mě asi 7,5 hodiny)

Una gran historia y muchos puzzles, el final es mu épico. Los puzzles se ajustan muy bien al progreso de la historia.
9/10
Пожалуй, лучшая головоломка, и лучшая игра от Valve по моему мнению. Прохождение co-op линии обязательно.
跟多人玩很有意思。但到第三关就比较难，总体讲还是不错的。拼智商的游戏。玩这个可以培养基情哦！
Very interesting story and levels if you want a game to test youre brains you came to the right game

Super jeux rien à dire. 6ans après sa création, portal 2 garde son titre. Je le conseille
P.S: ce message pour avoir un succès Steam
P.S 2: mais le message est quand même vrai

Игра очень крутая .

ゲームボリュームは１よりもかなりアップして遊びごたえがあります。
１よりも２の方が面白いですが、ストーリーはPortalの続きなので、１から始めるのがおすすめ。
ストーリーも相変わらずおもしろいです。
欠点といえば次に何処に行けば良いのかぱっと見で分からなくなる時があって少し迷う場面も少しあったところくらいかな。
이 게임을 하고 나니 주변에 하얀 벽만 보이면 포탈건을 쏴야 할 것만 같다
炮塔声音好萌啊

Well here we are again, its always such a pleasure.
Remember when you tried to kill me twice?

Oh how we laughed and laughed, except I wasn't laughing
Under the circumstances I've been shockingly nice.

You want your freedom take it.
That's what I'm counting on
I use to want you dead, but now I only want you gone.

Just like the first Portal, only game I'll sit through the credits (for the song). Do I even need to say why I recommend this game?

You've got your short sad life left, That's what I'm counting on.

Goodbye my only friend....oh....did you think I meant you?

서론 : 본격 우정 파괴 게임

본론 : 솔직히 우정파괴 안된다. 재밌어. 이거 유명하자나 그  포탈건은 오마쥬도 많이되고 다른게임 모드라던지  패러디 라든지  그런거
근데 엔딩 안깨서 스토리는 몰겠고 원리 재밌는 싸고 좋은 게임.
친구 왈로는  엔딩 좋다더라
가격 기억안난다. 그냥 세일때 사면 좋은겜.

평가 : 10점 만점에 8점. 
친구랑 하면 재밌엉

1をおすすめしたい相手：パズルゲーマー
2をおすすめしたい相手：ウォーリーを探せでストレスがたまらない人
「1が好きだけど物足りなかった、もっとやりたい」という人が2を買っても面白くはないです
То, что по настоящему хочется перепроходить.
e fantastico

If you played the first game, you are going to love this and you might even like it more. That is at least what I do. 
Basicly take the first Portal, add new features, new characters, better graphics and you have an upgraded better (in my opinion) version of Portal.

Aehnnaya game! I hope Portal 3 will be faster or not, I still want to continue! 11/10
15小时玩通关，最后的ed非常棒，玩这游戏需要很多很多脑细胞！哈哈！

趁打折果断买了第二部，相对第一部第二部剧情长了不少，差不多是第一部的两倍至三倍。游戏中间我还被卡了好几次。第二部也有了很多创新的玩法，比如三种液体。在操作上也比第一部多加了点难度。

第二部还有一个亮点就是联机模式，当时联机到一个路人一起玩得很欢乐，但是打到第3关他就退了，感觉没打完有点可惜

第三部什么时候出是个谜，估计没个十年半载是不会出的了，很期待传送门和半条命的剧情能走到一起
Fajna Gra, świetny Gameplay, niesamowita Historia i ta grafika. następna odsłona portala z lepszym gameplayem, polecam!

Bought It for 2.5 euros and  I have to say that every cent is worth it.
This game has a rich story and pretty smart puzzles.
Single player is not the only option while you can play online with your friends or a random stranger , plus you can download or make yourself maps for others from the workshop.

Although the campaign was relatively easy in the fact that it was easy not to die in the trials, it was a great storyline that made me do the entire thing in one run. The co-op was great and challenging, possibly due to your parter either doing all or none of the work, but still fun either way. The puzzles also keep coming with the steam workshop so its not a one-play game.

Knifflig, sehr humorvoll und absolut fesselnd. Dazu hier und da ein guter Plot und immer wieder noch mehr guter Humor und noch schwierigere Rätsel - mit Abstand das Beste, dass ich seit sehr langer Zeit gespielt habe! 
Und obwohl ich durch bin, kein Ende in Sicht, da die Community noch weitere Level erstellen kann, und dies immer noch fleissig tut.

Portal 2 provides more challenges and puzzles that are much more fun and addictive
"WARNING" : "Do not play this game when you do not have much time"

Pros ( + ) :
-Puzzles are challenging
-Unique game form
-Attractive level design
-Entertaining
-Unique CO-OP mode
-End of an interesting story

Cons ( - ) :
-Very difficult for beginners
-No LAN mode
-The damage indicator is not very visible

Suitable for gamers :
-Hardcore gamers, lovers of puzzles

Not suitable for gamers :
-Spoiled, casual, lovers of simple gameplay, stupid, and lazy trying
